data.lyric:
[ti:Oh My God]
[ar:Adele]
[al:30]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.30]Oh My God - Adele
[00:01.18]Lyrics by：Adele Adkins/Greg Kurstin
[00:02.35]Composed by：Adele Adkins/Greg Kurstin
[00:03.41]
[00:11.34]I ain't got too much time to spare
[00:14.98]
[00:15.99]But I'll make time for you to show how much I care
[00:20.79]
[00:22.11]Wish that I would let you break my walls
[00:26.33]
[00:26.88]But I'm still spinning out of control from the fall
[00:32.06]
[00:32.99]Boy you give good love I won't lie
[00:37.03]
[00:37.73]It's what keeps me comin' back even though I'm terrified
[00:42.54]
[00:44.24]I know that it's wrong
[00:47.25]But I want to have fun
[00:50.00]Mh yeah mh yeah
[00:54.66]
[00:55.20]I know that it's wrong
[00:58.18]But I want to have fun
[01:00.88]Mh yeah mh yeah
[01:05.66]Oh my God I can't believe it
[01:07.74]Out of all the people in the world oh
[01:11.10]What is the likelihood of jumping out of my life and into your arms
[01:16.54]Maybe baby I'm just losing my mind
[01:19.69]'Cause this is trouble but it feels right
[01:22.00]Teetering on the edge of Heaven and Hell is a battle I cannot fight
[01:27.51]
[01:30.52]I'm a fool but they all think I'm blind
[01:34.37]
[01:34.93]I'd rather be a fool than leave myself behind
[01:39.87]
[01:41.18]I don't have to explain myself to you
[01:45.90]I'm a grown woman and I do what I want to do
[01:51.47]
[01:52.51]I know that it's wrong
[01:55.34]But I want to have fun
[01:57.57]
[01:58.14]Mh yeah mh yeah
[02:03.33]I know that it's wrong
[02:06.23]But I want to have fun
[02:08.52]
[02:09.05]Mh yeah mh yeah
[02:13.85]Oh my God I can't believe it
[02:15.92]Out of all the people in the world oh
[02:19.27]What is the likelihood of jumping out of my life and into your arms
[02:24.84]Maybe baby I'm just losing my mind
[02:27.79]'Cause this is trouble but it feels right
[02:30.10]Teetering on the edge of Heaven and Hell is a battle I cannot fight
[02:35.66]"Lord don't let me" I say "Lord don't let me"
[02:38.08]I say "Lord don't let me let me down"
[02:39.93]
[02:40.81]Oh Lord
[02:41.29]"Lord don't let me" I say "Lord don't let me"
[02:43.45]I say "Lord don't let me let me down"
[02:45.23]Don't let me let myself down
[02:46.75]"Lord don't let me" I say "Lord don't let me"
[02:48.91]I say "Lord don't let me let me down"
[02:50.66]Oh my God
[02:51.18]
[02:52.01]"Lord don't let me" I say "Lord don't let me"
[02:54.36]I say "Lord don't let me let me down"
[02:56.26]Oh oh-oh-oh oh-oh-oh
[02:57.48]Oh my God I can't believe it
[02:59.53]Out of all the people in the world oh
[03:02.92]What is the likelihood of jumping out of my life and into your arms
[03:08.35]Maybe baby I'm just losing my mind
[03:11.37]'Cause this is trouble but it feels right
[03:13.81]Teetering on the edge of Heaven and Hell is a battle I cannot fight
[03:19.26]"Lord don't let me" I say "Lord don't let me"
[03:21.69]I say "Lord don't let me let me down"
[03:23.24]I know that it's wrong but I want to have fun
[03:25.12]"Lord don't let me" I say "Lord don't let me"
[03:27.10]I say "Lord don't let me let me down"
[03:28.93]Mh yeah mh yeah
[03:30.36]"Lord don't let me" I say "Lord don't let me"
[03:32.57]I say "Lord don't let me let me down"
[03:34.36]I know that it's wrong but I want to have fun
[03:35.98]"Lord don't let me" I say "Lord don't let me"
[03:38.00]I say "Lord don't let me let me down"
[03:39.79]Mh yeah mh yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Oh My God]
[ar:Adele]
[al:30]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.30]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.18]//
[00:02.35]//
[00:03.41]
[00:11.34]我无暇顾及其他
[00:14.98]
[00:15.99]但我会为你而来 只为证明我有多在乎你
[00:20.79]
[00:22.11]希望我能让你瓦解我的心防
[00:26.33]
[00:26.88]但我为你倾心 全然失控
[00:32.06]
[00:32.99]你的爱无与伦比 绝非虚言
[00:37.03]
[00:37.73]尽管惶恐 但你让我一次次地燃起希望
[00:42.54]
[00:44.24]我心里明白这绝非好事
[00:47.25]但我只想徜徉这片刻欢愉
[00:50.00]//
[00:54.66]
[00:55.20]我心里明白这绝非好事
[00:58.18]但我只想徜徉这片刻欢愉
[01:00.88]//
[01:05.66]让我不禁惊呼 难以置信
[01:07.74]大千世界芸芸众生
[01:11.10]而我却偏偏闯入你的世界 还有什么能媲美这难料的缘分呢
[01:16.54]或许 宝贝 我只是意乱情迷吧
[01:19.69]因为你是我的劫数 但我感觉美妙
[01:22.00]似是徘徊在天堂与地狱之间 置身于在这爱的战场 我缴械投降
[01:27.51]
[01:30.52]我为爱痴情 但人们认为我为爱执迷不悟
[01:34.37]
[01:34.93]宁愿当个傻瓜 我也不愿忽略自我
[01:39.87]
[01:41.18]我不需要向你解释我的所作所为
[01:45.90]我是一位成熟女性 我会随心所欲
[01:51.47]
[01:52.51]我心里明白这绝非好事
[01:55.34]但我只想徜徉这片刻欢愉
[01:57.57]
[01:58.14]//
[02:03.33]我心里明白这绝非好事
[02:06.23]但我只想徜徉这片刻欢愉
[02:08.52]
[02:09.05]//
[02:13.85]让我不禁惊呼 难以置信
[02:15.92]大千世界芸芸众生
[02:19.27]而我却偏偏闯入你的世界 还有什么能媲美这难料的缘分呢
[02:24.84]或许 宝贝 我只是意乱情迷吧
[02:27.79]因为你是我的劫数 但我感觉美妙
[02:30.10]似是徘徊在天堂与地狱之间 置身于在这爱的战场 我缴械投降
[02:35.66]上帝 不要让我 我说 上帝 不要让我
[02:38.08]我说 上帝 别让我对自己感到失望
[02:39.93]
[02:40.81]上帝
[02:41.29]上帝 不要让我 我说 上帝 不要让我
[02:43.45]我说 上帝 别让我对自己感到失望
[02:45.23]别让我对自己感到失望
[02:46.75]上帝 不要让我 我说 上帝 不要让我
[02:48.91]我说 上帝 别让我对自己感到失望
[02:50.66]我的天呐
[02:51.18]
[02:52.01]上帝 不要让我 我说 上帝 不要让我
[02:54.36]我说 上帝 别让我对自己感到失望
[02:56.26]//
